BrisaUpnp::BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP

BrisaUpnp::BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP Class Reference

BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP creates a device from a xml description file, with all it's attributes, it lets it ready to be used. More...

Detailed Description

BrisaDeviceXMLHandlerCP creates a device from a xml description file, with all it's attributes, it lets it ready to be used.

Method that set properly the attribute value to value that it is the content between the beginning tag and the finish one.

It's important to say that in each state it performs a different action.
